alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following counties, Cascade, Judith Basin and Meagher. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.3 to 0.6 inches are expected over the area through around 6 pm. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Neihart and Monarch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
